column1: Smoque BBQ////The brisket was good. It needed the additional B-B-Q sauce (a sweet sauce - provided) to enhance it. I also thought that it seemed to get cold around the edges of the bun. The cole slaw is the vinegar-based kind
column4: and I finished it all anyway. The brisket chili was quite good. It had a meaty flavor
column5: even before I scooped up the shredded beef which had fallen out of my sandwich and tossed that into it. Every day
column6: there is one custom side dish. If this is available when you visit here
